about_the_game:
Welcome to the ancient sci-fi world of Replicore, the co-op FPS that redefines the boundaries of teamwork!

1-4 PLAYER CO-OP ACTION

Fight your way with up to three other team members through ruined desert temples on an alien planet to recover treasures and valuable artifacts.
Only through teamwork and good coordination can you unleash the full potential of your Cores and defeat your enemies.

YOU ARE NOT BOUND TO YOUR BODY

The Core is a high-tech sphere that you can dematerialize yourself into and reconstruct out of at any time. Roll through narrow crevices or dash from one cover to another. Switching between core and character gives you both unique mobility and potent firepower.

YOUR CREW IS IN YOUR HAND

Throw your friends over chasms or to otherwise unreachable strategic positions from where they can fire at your enemies. Pull your team members’ cores towards you from a safe distance to get them out of critical situations.

BE THE GRENADE

Let your friends throw you straight into groups of enemy units or into their weak spots to blow them up with your Outburst ability. Modify your Core and choose from a variety of Outburst effects.

YOUR CORE, YOUR GAME STYLE

After completing a ruin, you earn experience points and high-tech resources from the ancient civilization to upgrade your Core. You are not tied to any fixed classes! Customize your weapons, equipment and abilities through the individual modifications of your Core and define your role in the team.



The Cores offer unique player interaction and are the reason why team play in Replicore is so much fun!

name: REPLICORE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K or AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 6600XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Replicore is a co-op shooter set in an ancient sci-fi world. Transform into your Core to roll, dash or throw your team members into the action or pull them out of tight spots to navigate the challenges of the mysterious ruins. Experience the first true Core-operative gameplay!
